snippet.title: Bramble: The Mountain King - Official Cinematic Trailer | Summer of Gaming 2021
snippet.description:
In a new and exclusive cinematic trailer for Bramble: The Mountain King, we get a gory, new look at the Nordic fairy tale-inspired adventure game following a young boy and a perilous journey to save his sister.

#IGN #Gaming #SummerOfGaming
